title: Here's Why Shraddha Kapoor's Mum Broke Down On The Sets Of Her Daughter's Film | MissMalini
text:
Read » Bollywood » News & Gossip 
He re’s Why Shraddha Kapoor’s Mum Broke Down On The Sets Of Her Daughter’s Film Divya Rao Feb . 23 . 2017 Shraddha Kapoor, Shivangi Kapoor 
Shraddha Kapoor ‘s upcoming film Haseena has grabbed a lot of eyeballs already, thanks to its amazingly intense poster. While not much is known about the film, we do know that she’s acting with her brother Siddhant Kapoor and the two will be essaying their real life relationship in the film. According to a report in DNA, Shraddha’s mum visited her on set and watched a scene between her two children. This got her very emotional and she broke down looking at the bond they share. 
A source told DNA, 
Shraddha’s mother was thrilled to watch both her kids share the workspace together. She was very happy to see her daughter and son work together in the same film and replicate their real life relationship. It was indeed a very special moment for her. 
How sweet! Must be a special moment for a mother to see her children like this. :) 1
